testcase.name: Free CRM Login Test Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on login page.........................................passed When title of login page is Free CRM........................................passed Then user enters unsername and password.....................................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed

testcase.name: user is able to create new contacts
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on home page..........................................passed When user mouse over on contacts link.......................................passed Then user clicks on new contact link........................................passed Then user enters firstname and lastname.....................................passed Then user clicks on save button.............................................passed Then verify new contact is created..........................................passed
